thread.title: Lovely hotel. Excellent Customer Care
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel. Excellent Customer Care - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: csP1959IS
title: Lovely hotel. Excellent Customer Care
text: My family and I had a fantastic time at the Hilton Angel Islington hotel. The rooms were bright, modern, and well equipped. Nothing was too much trouble for the very professional staff at all levels. The breakfast was great with plenty of choice. We only wished we could have stayed longer. The hotel has a lovely atmosphere and you feel very welcomed and an excellent location with so many trendy bars and shops close by. Thank you.
